thread.title_full: Patients stranded at Nyeri referral hospital after the (SHIF) system experienced a malfunction | KenyaMOJA.com

author: K
title: Patients stranded at Nyeri referral hospital after the (SHIF) system experienced a malfunction | KenyaMOJA.com
text:
- 1 views
As the government continues to encourage Kenyans to enrol in the new health insurance scheme, the system faces significant operational challenges. Hundreds of patients were stranded at the Nyeri referral hospital after the Social Health Insurance Fund (SHIF) system experienced a major malfunction.
